exp1_bbn.physical_explanation: Chi-field is sourced by local mass concentrations. At BBN, homogeneous -> chi = 1.

exp2_gw.physical_explanation: Chi-field couples to scalar field E, not tensor perturbations. GWs propagate at c.

exp3_pulsars.physical_explanation: Chi-field couples to scalar field E, not geodesic motion. Binary pulsar timing is GR.

exp5_bao.physical_explanation: LFM coherence scales (10-100 kpc) are << BAO scale (150 Mpc). No conflict.

note: EXP-1 (BBN) and EXP-5 (BAO) are toy models, not full calculations
